author: epg
msg: (append_locks): Log whether user is stealing lock.
(remove_lock): Log whether user is breaking lock.

author: cmpilato
msg: Rename and repurpose svn_hash_from_keys().  (Which, by the way, also
has the effect of fixing a broken svn_client_get_changelists() function.)
be generic with the keys array; require strings.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a buglet in the SWIG bindings for svn_client_get_changelists().
(STRINGLIST): Add 'changelist' as a recognized list of strings.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r28613: when creating a second, third ... connection in ra_serf
we should initialize all fields of the connection object.
fields from the first connection when creating new connections.
